title: Chapter 843 - The Skeleton Spirit
body:
Chapter 843 - The Skeleton Spirit

Most nights, even when the lamps went out, there were still traces of light.

But now, as the night of the fifteenth day of the seventh lunar month descended, all of the Netherworld’s six territories and thirteen realms were plunged into absolute darkness.

No light remained!

This strange scene was unquestionably unsettling.

“Light the lanterns.”

Su Yi’s calm voice reverberated through the darkness.

Immediately afterward, Cui Chang’an shouted, “Light the lanterns!”

His voice spread throughout heaven and earth.

Instantly, countless hundred-foot Celestial Lanterns of the Grand Dao, each a different shape, soared into Ziluo City’s airspace. 

Firelight surged, dispelling the darkness.

It was as if a grand galaxy of fire shone above Ziluo City, illuminating both the nine heavens and the city below.

Celestial Lanterns of the Grand Dao were magic treasures refined with secret methods. They could disperse the darkness, but that wasn’t all; they could also ward off disaster and burn evil spirits.

Throughout history, whenever the Lantern Festival drew near, the Netherworld’s factions would prepare large numbers of these lanterns to neutralize the impending calamity.
